name: Green eggs and ham
description: 2 eggs, over easy. 1 ham. 2 cups baby spinach. - If you try them, you may like them.

name: Hot Banana Water
description: 1 quart water. 2 banana peels. - Bring water to boil, add banana peels, cover and wait for 10 minutes.

name: Peanut Butter and Jelly sandwich
description: You know what to do. Strawberry or Grape jelly, the choise is yours

name: Spaghetti and Meat Balls
description: 2 tbsp olive oil. 12 oz ground beef. 6 oz parmesan. 1 lb spaghetti. 6 cups crushed tomatoes. fresh parsley

name: Krabby Patty with Jellyfish Jelly
description: 1 patty. 2 sesame seed buns. 1 sliced tomato. lettuce. pickles. 1 slice cheddar cheese. secret sauce. jellyfish jelly.

name: Roll 'Em Up
description: Using a random number generator, combine 5 ingredients from 5 recipes. Flatten ingredients with a rolling pin. Bake at 400 degrees for 20 minutes.
